hadiths.text: Sufyan Ath-Thawri and others reported from Abu Ishaq, from Asim bin Damrah, that :Ali said: "Al-Witr is not incumbent like the status of the obligatory prayers, but it is a Sunnah which Allah's Messenger practiced

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الْوِتْرَ لَيْسَ بِحَتْمٍ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Al-Witr Is Not Incumbent
